member.name: T:Nito.Collections.Deque`1
member.summary: A double-ended queue (deque), which provides O(1) indexed access, O(1) removals from the front and back, amortized O(1) insertions to the front and back, and O(N) insertions and removals anywhere else (with the operations getting slower as the index approaches the middle).
member.typeparam: The type of elements contained in the deque.

member.name: F:Nito.Collections.Deque`1.DefaultCapacity
member.summary: The default capacity.

member.name: F:Nito.Collections.Deque`1._buffer
member.summary: The circular _buffer that holds the view.

member.name: F:Nito.Collections.Deque`1._offset
member.summary: The offset into where the view begins.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified capacity.
member.param: The initial capacity. Must be greater than 0.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the elements from the specified collection.
member.param: The collection. May not be null.

The number of elements in the range.

The range [offset, offset + count) is not within the range [0, sourceLength).

member.name: P:Nito.Collections.Deque`1.Capacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the capacity for this deque. This value must always be greater than zero, and this property cannot be set to a value less than .

member.summary: Increments by using modulo- arithmetic.
member.param: The value by which to increase . May not be negative.
member.returns: The value of after it was incremented.

member.name: M:Nito.Collections.Deque`1.PreDecrement(System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrements by using modulo- arithmetic.
member.param: The value by which to reduce . May not be negative or greater than .
member.returns: The value of before it was decremented.
